properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, HIDDEN_POST, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT FROM QA Q JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND Q.STATUS = 'N' AND $ LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM QA WHERE STATUS = 'N'
SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, HIDDEN_POST FROM QA Q JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE POST_NO = ? AND Q.STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM QA WHERE POST_NO = ? AND POST_PWD = ?
SELECT PHOTO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = 4 AND POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE QA SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO QA (BOARD_NO, POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, HIDDEN_POST) VALUES (4, SEQ_QANO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, 'N')
INSERT INTO QA (BOARD_NO, POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, HIDDEN_POST, POST_PWD) VALUES (4, SEQ_QANO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 4, SEQ_QANO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE QA SET POST_TITLE = ?, POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 4, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, NEW_NAME = ?, PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE, FILE_LEVEL = ? WHERE PHOTO_NO = ?
UPDATE QA SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT, POST_NO, WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_PLYNO.NEXTVAL, 4, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS')CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (WRITER= MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'N' AND POST_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC , REPLY_NO DESC
